snippet.title: Hammerwatch II  - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Gather your heroes and get ready for an incredible journey beyond the dungeons of Castle Hammerwatch. The million-selling hack ‘n slash action-adventure game gets a long-awaited and highly anticipated sequel on PC, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4/5 and Nintendo Switch. Hammerwatch II offers an improved, richer Hammerwatch gameplay experience with all-new immersive environments to explore. Quest, collect items, fight new enemies and go up against challenging bosses - all in four-player co-op.

Learn more at: www.modusgames.com
Follow Modus Games at www.twitter/modus_games
Wishlist Hammerwatch II at: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1538970/Hammerwatch_II/
